pkgmetadata.longdescription: Outlier detection using the iterated RMCD method of Cerioli (2010) // This package provides the iterated RMCD method of Cerioli (2010) for multivariate outlier detection via robust Mahalanobis distances. It also provides the finite-sample RMCD method discussed in the paper, as well as the methods provided in Hardin and Rocke (2005) and Green and Martin (2014).
